sentences.english: Engage your core muscles, then curl your upper body towards a sitting position.
sentences.chinese: 調動人體核心部位的肌肉力量向上擡體，成坐姿。

sentences.english: Chapter 4 DC Metadata Application Projection Study It studies Nordic metadata project.
sentences.chinese: 第四章都柏林核心元數據應用項目研究。

sentences.english: Mr. Kallasvuo said maps and navigation will be at the heart of the company's connection services.
sentences.chinese: 康培凱說，地圖和導航將是公司連接服務的核心。

sentences.english: A key part of the program hasbeen to commercialize outstanding health science technologies from themedical colleges.
sentences.chinese: 專業的核心是將醫學院校的生命科學技術商品化。

sentences.english: Is no substitute for showing off the core of her unique style.
sentences.chinese: 是否展露了無可取代的獨特風格纔是核心所在。

sentences.english: But in future chips, cores’ bandwidth requirements could fluctuate wildly.
sentences.chinese: 但在未來芯片中，核心的帶寬需求會劇烈波動。

sentences.english: Capital structure is the core of financial structure.
sentences.chinese: 資本結構是企業財務結構的核心內容。

sentences.english: Permafrost problems are the core of the three principal technical difficulties in the Qinghai-Tibet railway construction.
sentences.chinese: 青藏鐵路建設三大技術難題的核心是凍土問題。

sentences.english: We should establish a customer demands value-driven distribution intellectual model.
sentences.chinese: 應建立以顧客的需求價值爲核心的營銷心智模式。

sentences.english: The scout with shoulder-straps shouted on the outermost route as a routine.
sentences.chinese: 戴肩章的偵查員按例在最核心的線路上叫嚷。

sentences.english: Of long standing, Confucianism is the core of Chinese Culture.
sentences.chinese: 儒家思想淵遠流長，構成中國民族文化的核心。

sentences.english: So the owner must pay attention to this, to control cost in construction stage consciously.
sentences.chinese: 工程結算支付是承包工程合同管理的核心。

sentences.english: Its core is formed by two hubs that have a five-ringed structure at their core.
sentences.chinese: 它的中心是由兩枚以五環結構爲核心的輪轂組成。

sentences.english: Nobility and dignity of people is the core values of humanitarian.
sentences.chinese: 人的高貴和尊嚴是人道主義的核心價值。

sentences.english: Equal competition is the core of market order.
sentences.chinese: 平等競爭是市場秩序的核心。

sentences.english: And I'm convinced self-depreciation goes right to the heart of our financial ruts.
sentences.chinese: 我確信自我貶值促成了我們理財習慣的核心。

definition: important point/main point/focus/key (project etc)/to focus on/to put the emphasis on
to recount (e.g. results of election)/to re-evaluate
to revolve around/to center on (an issue)
axle/(fig.) central element/key element/axis (alliance of nations)
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
of the utmost importance/of highest priority
